about.summary: Inference of transmission tree from a dated phylogeny. Includes methods to simulate and analyse outbreaks. The methodology is described in Didelot et al. (2014) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msu121>, Didelot et al. (2017) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msw275>.

Inference of transmission tree from a dated phylogeny. Includes methods to simulate and analyse outbreaks. The methodology is described in Didelot et al. (2014) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msu121>, Didelot et al. (2017) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msw275>.

name: r-transphylo

about.summary: Inference of transmission tree from a dated phylogeny. Includes methods to simulate and analyse outbreaks. The methodology is described in Didelot et al. (2014) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msu121>, Didelot et al. (2017) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msw275>.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.4.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-transphylo
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/TransPhylo_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/TransPhylo/TransPhylo_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 69d7e48b2d111e6e217db21e606bed83020cceabfb65341868d036e44f620694

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcpp >=0.12.8
    - r-ape
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-rcpp >=0.12.8
    - r-ape

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('TransPhylo')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('TransPhylo')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=TransPhylo
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Inference of transmission tree from a dated phylogeny. Includes methods to simulate
    and analyse outbreaks. The methodology is described in Didelot et al. (2014) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msu121>,
    Didelot et al. (2017) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msw275>.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: TransPhylo
# Version: 1.4.4
# Date: 2020-06-01
# Title: Inference of Transmission Tree from a Dated Phylogeny
# Authors@R: c(person("Xavier","Didelot", email="xavier.didelot@gmail.com", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0003-1885-500X"), role=c("aut", "cre")), person("Yuanwei", "Xu", email = "y.xu@bham.ac.uk", role = c("ctb")))
# Maintainer: Xavier Didelot <xavier.didelot@gmail.com>
# Description: Inference of transmission tree from a dated phylogeny. Includes methods to simulate and analyse outbreaks. The methodology is described in Didelot et al. (2014) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msu121>, Didelot et al. (2017) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msw275>.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0)
# Imports: Rcpp (>= 0.12.8), stats, graphics, ape
# Suggests: knitr, testthat, purrr, coda, grDevices, lattice
# LinkingTo: Rcpp
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# SystemRequirements: C++11
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2020-06-04 10:49:19 UTC; Xavier
# Author: Xavier Didelot [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1885-500X>), Yuanwei Xu [ctb]
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-06-08 21:40:14 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.3

about.summary: Inference of transmission tree from a dated phylogeny. Includes methods to simulate and analyse outbreaks. The methodology is described in Didelot et al. (2014) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msu121>, Didelot et al. (2017) <doi:10.1093/molbev/msw275>.
